column1: Our MSc Interpreting course is one of the most established and respected interpreting degrees of its kind in the UK and offers professional standard training in Chinese, French, German and Spanish.OverviewOur masters degree in InterpretingÂ is designed for those who have native/near-native command of English and one other language from:
